about_the_game: Available for download, the 36-song For a Vast Future OST sets the atmospheric tone of the war-torn, post-apocalyptic landscape. Based on chiptune stylings from the 80s-90s, this OST is evocative of the glory days of handheld gaming. These songs run the gamut from atmospheric noise to blood pumping uptempo romps. This soundtrack is sure to please the retro gaming enthusiast in you!
